location_notes: Name/Serial (Capacity/Data) plate in operator compartment or cowl/instrument area; record serial exactly as shown.
Chassis serial stamped on frame (common frame-side or near cowl); engine serial on block (gas/diesel positions differ).
Name/Serial plate near operator controls; verify against chassis/frame stamp if plate is missing.
Serial/Name plate by the operator seat/console area; embossed/stamped serial on frame or battery area; mast has its own serial plate.
